Text:
This is a REALLY NICE toolkit! Thank you for posting. Personally, I think this CD is a MUST-HAVE. I frequently need low-level system access, and this one turned out to be a nice Set. Along with Bootable CDs of Ubuntu, BackTrack, Infr@ LiveCD and others, this is actually a FRESH addition. Very Nice.
